text: Sergey Wolfgangowitsch Zagraevsky (, ; 20 August 1964 - 6 July 2020) was a Russian-Israeli painter,Articles about Sergey Zagraevsky's art architectural historian, writer and theologian.See Prof. Dr. Sergey Zagraevsky's bibliography He was born in Moscow. Zagraevsky was also a full member of Russian art critics Academy from 2001 until his death,Zagraevsky on Russian Art critics academy's website (in Russian) the AICA from 2004 until his death, and the Writers union of Russia (since 2001), a Honored culture worker of Russia (since 2009),High awards of Russia a member of Russian Academy of Arts from 2013 until his death. Zagraevsky died on 6 July 2020 at a Moscow hospital from acute heart failure, aged 55. title: Sergey Zagraevsky
